snippet: Analysts are outdoing themselves with forecasts of Amazon’s success with the new Kindle Fire. But they are reducing their forecasts of the overall e-reader market, which suggests that they see the basic Kindles losing popularity.
abstract: Analysts are outdoing themselves with forecasts of Amazon’s success with the new Kindle Fire. But they are reducing their forecasts of the overall e-reader market, which suggests that they see the basic Kindles losing popularity.

headline.main: Will the Kindle Fire Kill E-Readers?
